text: @AndrewScheer You petty little prick there is nothing to be gained by playing the blame game right now in the middle of #COVID19 pandemic. For one thing China is he biggest supplier in the world of PPE but then again why they hell would you care. Blame can be accessed after this is over #STFU https://t.co/kRV9tpud5F
